entries.name: generate(size)           => RSA instanceclick to toggle source
new(key_size)                 => RSA instanceclick to toggle source
export([cipher, pass_phrase]) => PEM-format Stringclick to toggle source
params => hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: THIS METHOD IS INSECURE, PRIVATE INFORMATION CAN LEAK OUT!!!

entries.name: private? => true | falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Does this keypair contain a private key?

entries.name: public? => trueclick to toggle source
entries.desc: The return value is always true since every private key is also a public key.

entries.name: public_key → RSAclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Makes new RSA instance containing the public key from the private key.

entries.name: set_crt_params(dmp1, dmq1, iqmp) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets dmp1, dmq1, iqmp for the RSA instance. They are calculated by d mod (p - 1), d mod (q - 1) and q^(-1) mod p respectively.

entries.name: set_factors(p, q) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets p, q for the RSA instance.

entries.name: set_key(n, e, d) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets n, e, d for the RSA instance.

entries.name: sign_pss(digest, data, salt_length:, mgf1_hash:) → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Signs data using the Probabilistic Signature Scheme (RSA-PSS) and returns the calculated signature.

entries.name: to_der => DER-format Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Outputs this keypair in DER encoding.

entries.name: to_text => Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: THIS METHOD IS INSECURE, PRIVATE INFORMATION CAN LEAK OUT!!!

entries.name: verify_pss(digest, signature, data, salt_length:, mgf1_hash:) → true | falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Verifies data using the Probabilistic Signature Scheme (RSA-PSS).
